properties.description: WakeCap is a private construction technology company specializing in IoT-based workforce management solutions; with 81 employees (24.2% YoY growth), $8.9M annual revenue, founded in 2017, headquartered in Saudi Arabia, and $30.5M in total funding, last raised in May 2025. The company provides SaaS and IoT solutions for site safety, productivity, and resource tracking, serving the construction industry with recent acquisitions and strategic collaborations.
properties.content:
[Skip to content](https://wakecap.com/wakecap.com#content)

Learn More

Trusted by the world’s most ambitious builders.

WakeCap is a sensor-powered project-controls system for real-time workforce visibility and site-wide intelligence. Deployed on some of the world’s largest and most complex projects including NEOM, ARAMCO, and Qiddiya.

91%

reduction in safety observations

25%

gain in productivity

70%

faster incident response

## The WakeCAP System

01

01

### Connect

Smart sensors built into hard hats, vehicles, and tools stream real-time location and activity while WakeCap’s field apps capture daily plans, permits, and logs, linking people, assets, and paperwork in one data feed.

02

02

### Mesh

A self-forming anchor network collects every packet on site, no GPS, Wi-Fi, or cabling needed.

03

03

### Active Intelligence

The WakeCap dashboard fuses sensor and app data into live maps, KPIs, and predictive alerts covering productivity, safety, and logistics.

> Besix Group

**Uptown Tower Project, Dubai, UAE** Zone-level tracking cut billing errors and boosted output on a 78-story build.

[Full Case Study](https://wakecap.com/cases#case-study-besix)

> Saudi Aramco

**Jafurah Project, Saudi Arabia** Real-time helmet tracking enabled faster responses and fewer risks.

[Full Case Study](https://wakecap.com/cases#case-study-aramco)

> Arabian Construction Co.

**Jubail Island Project, Abu Dhabi, UAE**

Live oversight and subcontractor tracking improved performance site-wide.

[Full Case Study](https://wakecap.com/cases#case-study-acc)

> NEOM

**Oxagon Project, Saudi Arabia**

Sensor-powered visibility eliminated waste across 100K+ workers.

[Full Case Study](https://wakecap.com/cases#case-study-neom)

company.about:
We help construction companies to improve safety measures, quantify labor productivity, and automate workforce logistics. 

WakeCap comprises an innovative harness that works seamlessly with a construction hardhat without compromising the structural integrity of the helmet, non-GPS network that connects your worksite securely and scale up with your project, dashboard monitoring system that easily integrates into your existing applications and project management software.
